argument.description: Optional. The number of digits to round the fractional seconds to.

description: The PostgreSQL current_time function returns the current time with the time zone.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT current_time;
       timetz
--------------------
 20:18:08.586881+00
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT current_time(1);
    timetz
---------------
 20:18:08.6+00
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT current_time(2);
    timetz
---------------
 20:18:08.59+00
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT current_time(3);
    timetz
---------------
 20:18:08.587+00
(1 row)
